metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19797 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibSass 3.5.5, a NULL Pointer Dereference in the function Sass::Selector_List::populate_extends in SharedPtr.hpp (used by ast.cpp and ast_selectors.cpp) may cause a Denial of Service (application crash) via a crafted sass input file.

notes.Note: pfsmorigo> the affected file is src/functions.cpp (not src/fn_utils.cpp)

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
